bibl.title: Ὅτι πλεῖστα θωμάσια <Αἴγυπτος> ἔχει καὶ ἔργα λόγου μέζω παρέχεται πρὸς πᾶσαν χώρην ... Egyptian Collections in Hellenic Museums: A Brief History and Some Pieces. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: See pp. 16-20: - 1. The National Archaeological Museum of Athens; - 2. The Benaki Museum of Athens; - 3. The Herakleion Archaeological Museum, Crete; - 4. The Samos Archaeological Museum.

bibl.title: Ancient Egypt and Antique Europe. Two Parts of the Mediterranean World. Papers from a Session Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Seventh Annual Meeting in Esslingen 2001

bibl.seg: MARAVELIA Amanda-Alice, Ὅτι πλεῖστα θωμάσια <Αἴγυπτος> ἔχει καὶ ἔργα λόγου μέζω παρέχεται πρὸς πᾶσαν χώρην ... Egyptian Collections in Hellenic Museums: A Brief History and Some Pieces. Avec résumé en anglais.

Amanda-Alice MARAVELIA (Ed.), Ancient Egypt and Antique Europe. Two Parts of the Mediterranean World. Papers from a Session Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Seventh Annual Meeting in Esslingen 2001 = BAR International Series. 1052 (Oxford, 2002) pp. 15-29, 1 tabl., 5 pll.
See pp. 16-20: - 1. The National Archaeological Museum of Athens; - 2. The Benaki Museum of Athens; - 3. The Herakleion Archaeological Museum, Crete; - 4. The Samos Archaeological Museum.
